resources.string: 1. Both sides use black and white pawns respectively, and play at the intersection of the straight and horizontal lines of the chessboard.
2. The five sub-connections can be horizontal, vertical and diagonal.
3. The first to form a five-point line wins.
This is our project app about gomoku game.
Group Member: Wenhui Liu, Zhe Zhang

The game of Gomoku(Five in a Row) originated in China. Around five thousand years ago, Xuanyuan Huangdi, the ancestor of the Chinese nation, unintentionally drew 17 horizontal lines and 17 vertical lines, and this unintentional invention created the Gomoku.
After the continuous spread of Gomoku among the people, it was later introduced to Japan.In 1899, after Japan improved the rules of traditional Gomoku, it began to develop.
At the beginning of the 20th century, traditional Gomoku was introduced to Europe from Japan.
In the 21st century, more and more countries around the world began to hold Gomoku competitions.
